extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
extension.description: This plugin is used to send SMS reminder to your subscribers. It also sends SMS notification to admin when someone subscribes for your subscription plans.

field.name: last_run
field.label: Last Run Time
field.description: Store Last Run Time of the plugin

field.name: phones
field.label: Administrator Phone Numbers
field.description: Enter phone numbers of administrators who want to receive SMS notification when someone subscribe for a subscription plan on the site. Multiple phone numbers are supported, just separate them by comment.

field.name: number_subscribers
field.label: Number Subscribers
field.description: Number of subscribers which we will send reminder each time the plugin run.

field.name: time_ranges
field.label: Time Rages
field.description: If you want to send SMS to subscribers within certain time ranges, use this parameter. For example, set it to 5,14 will make the system only send SMS reminder from 5am to 2pm. Set it to 8,10;14:18 will allow sending SMS reminders between 8 to 10 am and 2pm to 6pm.

field.name: trigger_reminder_code
field.label: Trigger Reminder Code (Leave empty unless you are using cron job to send reminder)
field.description: Enter a secret string here if you want to use cron job to trigger sending reminder. Refer to our documentation for more details

field.name: debug
field.label: Debug
field.description: In case set to Yes, the reminder emails will be checked and sent on every page load, for debug purpose only
